body:
Thank you for the bug report and repro steps.

Might be related to https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/21151 ?

I have reproduced with your script on v24.0rc2, but not yet gone through the script logic in detail to see why this is failing since https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21166:

